reviewText: My girls ages 3 & 5 love this movie but they like the "Hidden Treasures" a little more.  All of the 'Guess How Much I love You' are sweet stories which teach a little lesson and the voice of the father, 'big nutbrown hare', is warm, funny and caring.
My 4 year old daughter loves this video.  Very cute animation and great life lessons learned in the episodes.  I would highly recommend it.
This movie is kind to Granny's ears no loud and obnoxious yelling.  Tells sweet tales of Love.  I love them both.

We found the series on Amazon Prime Video but this one doesn't have the same British voices. Wish I had known it was the American version, would have purchased the British version instead. DVD works well just don't like the American version.

My OB sent me the book and stuffed bunny set as a gift after my son was born. My daughter liked it too so I went on Amazon to see if I could find a bigger bunny for her and I came across these DVD's. They are so sweet and cute.

I like this story and design. It is basis on beautiful nature. I strongly recommend these DVD series to all parent.
It is good to character building for children.
My grandson loves it. thank you
Great for getting ready for preschool.
Super cute video, the 3-5 year olds in my preschool class love watching it. The theme song is super catchy. Check out the book companion!
My great-granddaughter is enthralled with Little Nut Brown Hare and loves all the DVD's  They are low-key and all teach valuable messages to children.
My daughter loves this dvd,  She's able to take adventures through the meadows and learn lessons of sharing and caring.
My 2 yr. old granddaughter's favorite series.  So cute.
